answers.0: Coins are our virtual currency used to generate AI-powered betslips (coupons). Each betslip generation costs 100 coins. When you purchase coin packages, you get a specific number of coins that can be used for generating predictions.
answers.1: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. For subscriptions, simply go to your profile settings and select 'Cancel Subscription'. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. No hidden fees or questions asked.
answers.2: We accept various payment methods depending on your country. For African countries, we support mobile money (MTN, Orange, Airtel), bank transfers, and credit/debit cards. The specific available methods will be shown during checkout based on your selected country.
answers.3: For any questions or support needs, please contact us at freecoder21@gmail.com. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with payment issues, technical problems, or any other inquiries you may have.
